question:
Consider the following statements about the National Health Policy 2017:
  1. It proposes to make health a fundamental right
  2. It intends to increase life expectancy at birth from 67.5 to 72 by 2025
  3. It envisages a three dimensional integration of AYUSH Systems
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation:
First statement is incorrect. The Draft National Health Policy, 2015 proposed for making health a fundamental right, but the National Health Policy, 2017 declined the same. Second statement is again incorrect. The new policy intends to increase life expectancy at birth from 67.5 years to 70 years by 2025. Third statement is correct. The NHP, 2017 envisages a three dimensional integration of AYUSH Systems. Other salient features of the policy are as follows:
  • It intends to ensure free essential health care services in all public hospitals
  • It ensures for effective grievance redressal mechanism.
  • It intends to reduce infant mortality rate to 28 by 2019 against 34 recorded in 2016.
  • It aims to reduce the under five mortality to 23 by 2025 against 41 recorded in 2016.
  • It intends to achieve the global 2020 HIV target
